hero.title: I build clear, maintainable, and useful applications.
hero.subtitle1: Full-stack software developer, product-oriented, with a strong focus on code quality, readability, and real-world impact.
hero.subtitle2: Trained at Hive Helsinki and experienced in professional environments, I design web and mobile apps built to evolve over time.
hero.meta: Helsinki, Finland · Full-stack · Vue / TypeScript · Go / Node · Testing

journey.title: My journey
journey.subtitle: Training, experience, context.
journey.p1: Former team leader turned developer, I completed a demanding software engineering program at Hive Helsinki.
journey.p2: I then worked as a full-stack developer on real products, in international and fully remote contexts.
journey.p3: My path taught me technical rigor as well as the importance of communication, feedback, and teamwork.
journey.meta: Hive Helsinki · HyperIn · Arties · FullStack Open

maintainable.title: Maintainable applications
maintainable.body: Clear architecture, readable code, relevant tests, and controlled technical debt. Simple, understandable solutions that are easy to evolve.

fullstack.title: Pragmatic full-stack
fullstack.body: Interface, API, database: I choose tools based on product context, not hype.

problemSolving.title: Problem solving
problemSolving.body: Strong foundation in systems programming and analysis. I like to understand deeply before building.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.body: Vue.js · Quasar · TypeScript · HTML · CSS · React · Svelte · Flutter

backend.title: Backend
backend.body: Node.js · Deno · Go · Python · C · C# · Java

data.title: Data
data.body: PostgreSQL · SQL · MongoDB · Redis · Typesense · Neon

tools.title: Tools & practices
tools.body: Git · Docker · Agile · Jira · Confluence · Testing · CI/CD · Performance · Figma

quality.title: Quality over speed
quality.body: I prioritize clear, tested, understandable code over fast but fragile solutions.

collaboration.title: Collaboration & feedback
collaboration.body: Used to collaborative environments, I work closely with designers, PMs, and devs.

improvement.title: Continuous improvement
improvement.body: I learn continuously and improve my practices through projects and feedback.

autonomy.title: Responsible autonomy
autonomy.body: I make decisions, document, and stay aligned with product goals.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Want to discuss a project, a role, or a collaboration?

notFound.title: Project not found
notFound.body: The link looks incorrect or the project no longer exists.

cta.title: Want to discuss?
cta.body: I can walk through the technical choices, the structure, and the next steps.
